title: HIGH PING MAYBE SERVER?
body:
Okay so I played a ARAM match before having dinner and i had like 230 - 1500 ping the whole game and so I couldn't do anything and then after I had dinner which was like 2 hours later I played a ranked game and I had 230 - 1500 ping spiking with my brother and half my team had the same problem so I was wondering has anyone else had this problem and is this a server problem?? but before the game ended i had 40 - 63 ping for like 1 minute and we actually could do something  and then after the minute it went make to 230 - 1500 ping and we lost and I really dont wanna go back to bronze 1 XD cause I just promoted to silver 5 
Thanks for reading this 
P.S  I'll tell you guys if my ping gets better or stays the same or becomes worse

replies.body:
Well, if everyone's lagging, then the enemy team wouldn't have any sort of advantage over yours. The loss would still be entirely your own (team's) fault.

If it's the case where only your team is lagging, then it's probably a connection issue.

I won't deny it being Riot's servers, though. They have been playing up lately.
